review: Dr Leenatha has been my daughter's Pediatrician since birth. We trust her with our life with regard to our daughter's health and well-being. She has been able to always explain the cause of illness and the treatment process and the recovery period. She goes out of her way to always be available to us even at odd hours in cases of emergencies. It shows her commitment to her purpose in the field of her expertise.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been visiting this dr from last 18 months she is very friendly, patience and very polite. We have been given all the required details. I strongly recommend this doctor for children.

If I could give it 100 stars, I would!!!!

Dr. Leenatha Reddy N is a very kind and caring pediatric doctor. (Also, the staff is very friendly and professional).
She provided an exceptional level of care to my SON during his NICU stay. She explained everything to me in a very clear manner.  That was by far the most difficult time of my life. She not only cared for him but for us as well.

Now My Son is doing great which would have been an impossibility without her effort.

I would like to share one incident.
 
On June 9th, 2022 Dr. Leenatha Reddy N traveled overnight from her native to Bangalore. She already made all the arrangements for my son's further treatment (Airway Evaluation with Laryngoscope on 10-06-2022 at Rainbow Children's Hospital Marathalli Banglore.)

We went to Rainbow Children's Hospital from Kinder Hospital along with my 22-day-old baby. My tears are not stopping she is beside my kid in an ambulance. The way she managed the situation hats up. 
Morning 10 AM to 3 PM she did not even take a cup of coffee. She was with my Kid. after the procedure only she went for a break. It shows her commitment and dedication.

That day my respect for doctors was doubled.

Never make the mistake of consulting her for your child. She never gives an explanation to any question asked; her answer to any concern is always 'it's normal, enjoy the milestone.' She ***** ********* ** ****** *** is always in a hurry. She did not comfort our baby during vaccination and handled very roughly when we didn't opt for a painless vaccine, (I believe it should be a personal choice) starting an argument. *** ***** ** **** *** **** **** * ******* ******* *** **** ********* ** *** *********

I would never recommend this doctor to anyone who wants their baby to be in good hands and receive the right consultation.

Dr. Leenatha is a Gem of a Doctor, calm and composed as ever, humble would be an understatement. God Gifted with her Skills. Takes utmost care of the NewBorn and the Mother. Helped and guided us in each and every step. Thank you Doctor for everything :)
Friendly doctor... Explained the issue clearly... Clarified all out doubts... Smiling and cheerfull...

Very friendly and she gives you enough time to explain the condition.
The effort to make the kid comfortable during consult is noteworthy!
